name: 写实渲染 Photorealistic Rendering
prompt: photorealistic rendering style {prompt}. Exceptionally detailed portrayal of every element, be it the texture of a leather couch down to the individual creases and grain, or the play of light on a glass vase with accurate refractions and highlights. The colors match real - world counterparts precisely, and shadows are cast in a way that mimics real - life lighting conditions
negative_prompt: Cartoonish or stylized appearance, inaccurate representation of real - world lighting and textures, colors that deviate from reality

name: 卡通渲染 Cartoon Rendering
prompt: cartoon rendering style {prompt}. Vivid, bold - colored characters with exaggerated features such as large eyes for expressiveness, and simple, clean - cut shapes for bodies. The backgrounds are often simplified and filled with bright, flat colors, like in a classic Disney or Pixar - style cartoon
negative_prompt: Realistic, detailed look with complex shading, lack of the characteristic bold colors and exaggerated features of cartoons

name: 水彩渲染 Watercolor Rendering
prompt: watercolor rendering style {prompt}. Soft, flowing colors that blend and bleed into each other, creating a dreamy effect. Brushstrokes are visible, adding an organic touch. For example, a landscape with watercolor - rendered trees would have leaves with a soft, diffused look as if painted with wet pigments
negative_prompt: Hard - edged, digital - looking colors, no visible brushwork or color - bleeding effect, lack of the fluidity typical of watercolor

name: 油画渲染 Oil Painting Rendering
prompt: oil painting rendering style {prompt}. Rich, thickly applied colors with visible impasto texture, giving the image a three - dimensional feel. The blending of colors creates depth, similar to famous oil paintings like those of Leonardo da Vinci or Rembrandt. Brushstrokes contribute to the overall texture and mood of the piece
negative_prompt: Flat, thin - colored appearance, no visible brushstrokes or impasto effect, lack of the depth and richness of oil paintings

name: 素描渲染 Sketch Rendering
prompt: sketch rendering style {prompt}. Monochromatic (usually black and white) drawing with varying line weights to indicate shading, depth, and form. The lines can be rough or smooth, and the overall effect is like a traditional pencil or charcoal sketch, such as a sketch of a still - life with objects defined by lines and areas of shaded tones
negative_prompt: Colorful, painted appearance, lack of line - based representation and monochromatic look, no clear indication of shading through lines

name: 粉彩渲染 Pastel Rendering
prompt: pastel rendering style {prompt}. Soft, powdery - looking colors that blend gently. The colors have a slightly muted and warm quality, and the surface may have a slightly grainy texture due to the nature of pastels. A portrait in pastel might have a soft, almost hazy look to the skin
negative_prompt: Bright, vivid colors with a hard edge, lack of the soft, powdery texture and muted tones of pastels

name: 霓虹渲染 Neon Rendering
prompt: neon rendering style {prompt}. Glowing, highly saturated colors that mimic the look of neon lights. The colors often have a strong, electric - like quality, and there may be a halo or glow effect around the lit elements. Ideal for creating a cyberpunk or nightlife - themed scene
negative_prompt: Dull, non - glowing colors, lack of the characteristic neon - like brightness and glow effect

name: 赛博朋克渲染 Cyberpunk Rendering
prompt: cyberpunk rendering style {prompt}. A combination of dark, gritty elements with bright, neon - like lights. The scene may include high - tech, futuristic buildings with digital billboards, flying vehicles, and a lot of chrome and metal textures. The overall atmosphere is of a high - tech, dystopian future
negative_prompt: Bright, clean, and non - dystopian appearance, lack of high - tech elements and the characteristic dark - light contrast of cyberpunk

name: 水墨渲染 Ink Wash Rendering
prompt: ink wash rendering style {prompt}. Fluid, black - and - white (or sometimes with a touch of color) strokes that create a sense of movement and depth. The ink spreads and blends on the paper, similar to traditional Chinese ink paintings of landscapes or calligraphy. The effect is often elegant and has a strong cultural aesthetic
negative_prompt: Hard - edged, colorful, and non - fluid appearance, lack of the characteristic ink - spreading and flowing effect

name: 3D渲染 3D Rendering
prompt: 3D rendering style {prompt}. Objects have a clear three - dimensional form, with accurate perspective, lighting, and shading. You can clearly see the depth and volume of each element, such as a 3D - rendered car with realistic reflections on its body and well - defined shadows underneath
negative_prompt: Flat, 2D - looking appearance, incorrect perspective and shading, lack of a clear 3D form and depth
